name: Arenti
0:
”Alexa, show the camera”
”Alexa, hide the doorbell”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Arenti is a leading developer for safer, easier & smarter home security solutions, we have upgraded our latest models to be able to use for Alexa.
With Arenti skill , you can lie on your sofa and watch live streaming videos from Arenti cameras on Amazon Alexa devices, for example, Echo Show, and Echo Spot...

To get started, please follow the steps below:
1. Install Arenti App from App Store and Google Play, connect the camera to Arenti App, keep it online and running.
2. Find Arenti Skill in Alexa App, click "Enable Skill" to link your camera with the Alexa account, then find your camera.
3.User name is the email address/phone number in Arenti APP.
4.Please do not use the auto-filling, input the information manually.
5.Please select the country.
6.If login failed, please re-start the Alexa APP and enable the skill again.
7. Try voice commands like "Alexa, show the living room" to get live videos and check everything's fine in your sweet home.

Below models support Alexa:
Arenti models:
IN1 Indoor camera
GO1 battery camera


Laxihub models:
M1 Indoor Mini camera
P1 Indoor PT camera
O1 Outdoor bullet camera
F1 Floodlight camera
B1 Video doorbell

Any questions, feel free to contact us at support@arenti.com.
